We believe that some children are not properly punisted or treated in the correct manner when in solitary confinment.
Also we feel there is not enoughjustice for children on the street who are affected by the small majority who don't know how to behave.
Lastly some children have a better lifes in jail. It could get to the state that children do the crime to get a better life in jail.
I calling for a review on the soultion confinment!
